pages.text: You'll need to make a forge controller (any material) first, but note its hierarchy (e.g. 2 for deep slate). Some formulations require high-rise forging furnaces to be smelted.
A total of 26 blocks of the same material as the forge controller are then made
The forging furnace is placed according to the above multi-block structure. Forging furnaces can be used to smelt some alloys.
